snippet.title: Crysis 3 The Lost Island Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover The Lost Island Multiplayer DLC ! Join us on Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial and subscribe now : http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=GameNewsOfficial. With new weapons, new MP modes and new maps !

Crysis 3 The Lost Island Launch Trailer (HD). Available now for PS3, Xbox 360 and PC ! Subscribe now to get the latest game trailer, gameplay teaser & cinematic video, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos with Game News Official (GameNews) ! Crysis 3 Lost Island Trailer.
